# 44th Golden Bell Awards

The 44th Golden Bell Awards (Mandarin:第44屆金鐘獎) was held on October 16, 2009 at Sun Yat-sen Memorial Hall in Taipei, Taiwan. The ceremony was broadcast live by TTV.
